title: Keybinds broken
body:
So I can't figure out what my wife did to her account, but most of her keybinds are broken, and I can't fix them.  

Basically, the symptons I've noted so far are:  
-Cannot LEFT click on anything (ie, if I wanted to see the health left on a jungle camp).  Holding shift while left clicking fixes this.
-Cannot left click the minimap to move my screen.  Holding shift fixes this as well.
-Cannot ping using G or V, but Alt works for some reason. (G is the assigned ping key according to the hotkey menu)
-With quickcast DISABLED, QWER are effectively disabled.  Everything works normally with quickcast on.

Things I've tried:
-Using "Restore Defaults" in game.
-Deleting the entire "Config" folder
-Logging onto her account from my computer.  No worky worky.
-Logging onto my account from her computer.  Works fine.

The fact that the problem follows the account is confusing the hell out of me, because I can't find any account specific settings.

Please help.

replies.body:
This should be able to be resolved after deleting the config folder while in a custom match. As a refresher, the config folder can be found in the directory below:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

After you delete the folder, leave the custom match, then hop into another to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if this worked.

Holy crap, someone give this man a promotion.

It worked, thanks a bunch.

You're welcome! Keep on being both prompt *and* critical. :D

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
